title: Resident Profile print toggle for physician name/signature blank fields

requirements.summary: Add a screen-only toggle on ResidentProfilePage near Print to control whether the next print includes physician name/signature blank fields.
acceptanceCriteria: ResidentProfilePage shows a clearly labeled toggle control in the header area near the existing Print action (screen-only; not shown in print).
The toggle label is in English and clearly indicates that the printout will include space for Physician's Name and Signature.
Toggling the switch immediately affects what will appear in the next print (no page reload required).
Existing Print button behavior (calling window.print()) remains unchanged.

file_operations.description: Add local UI state for the print option and render a clearly labeled screen-only toggle beside the existing Print button. Use existing shadcn-ui components (e.g., Switch + Label) to implement the toggle without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Pass the toggle value down to ResidentProfilePrintReport while keeping the Print button behavior as window.print().

requirements.summary: Conditionally render a physician name/signature handwriting area in the print-only ResidentProfilePrintReport based on the toggle state from ResidentProfilePage.
acceptanceCriteria: ResidentProfilePrintReport accepts a boolean input (passed from ResidentProfilePage) that controls whether the physician name/signature blank area renders.
When enabled, the print report includes both labels "Physician's Name" and "Physician's Signature" with visible blank line space to write on.
When disabled, the physician name/signature blank area is not present anywhere in the printed output.
Print layout remains readable and does not overlap existing content; page breaks remain valid (the report still prints cleanly).

file_operations.description: Update the component props to accept a boolean (e.g., includePhysicianNameSignatureFields) and conditionally render a dedicated print-only section containing the labels "Physician's Name" and "Physician's Signature" with blank line areas suitable for handwriting. Place the section in a location that preserves readability and page breaks (e.g., near the end of the report on page 3 with break-avoid where appropriate).
Wire the new boolean prop into the existing ResidentProfilePrintReport render so the print-only output reflects the current toggle state immediately (no reload).

requirements.summary: Add print-specific CSS for consistent physician name/signature blank line rendering without affecting existing print report styling.
acceptanceCriteria: New print-specific CSS classes (if needed) are added to frontend/src/index.css under the existing @media print section.
The blank lines are visible on printed output and in print preview across common browsers.
No regressions to existing print-only report styling (headers, section styling, tables, page breaks) are introduced.

file_operations.description: Within the existing @media print block, add narrowly-scoped CSS classes used by the new physician name/signature section (e.g., spacing, line thickness, and ensuring borders/backgrounds print reliably) so handwriting lines are consistently visible across print preview and printed output without changing existing print styles.
Apply the new print-only CSS classes to the physician name/signature blank line elements so styling is controlled solely by the print CSS additions and does not impact other report sections.
